owners_by_email.map: function (doc) { if(doc.email) { if (doc.info.email) { emit(doc.info.email, doc) } else { emit (doc.email, doc); } } }

updates.checkin: function (doc, req) { doc.last_seen = new Date(); return [doc, doc._id]; }
updates.edit: function(doc, req) { var fields = JSON.parse(req.body); for (var i in fields) { doc[i] = fields[i] } var resp = eval(uneval(doc)); delete resp._revisions; return [doc, toJSON(resp)]; }
